BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.delay#
BlackBox.type:
delay#
  :: ( KnownDomain dom conf  -- ARG[0]
     , Undefined a )          -- ARG[1]
  => Clock dom                -- ARG[2]
  -> Enable dom               -- ARG[3]
  -> a                        -- ARG[4]
  -> Signal clk a             -- ARG[5]
  -> Signal clk a

BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.register#
BlackBox.type:
register#
  :: ( KnownDomain dom conf   -- ARG[0]
     , Undefined a )          -- ARG[1]
  => Clock dom                -- ARG[2]
  -> Reset dom                -- ARG[3]
  -> Enable dom               -- ARG[4]
  -> a                        -- ARG[5] (powerup value)
  -> a                        -- ARG[6] (reset value)
  -> Signal clk a             -- ARG[7]
  -> Signal clk a
BlackBox.template:
-- register begin~IF ~ISENABLED[4] ~THEN
~GENSYM[~COMPNAME_register][0] : block
  signal ~GENSYM[~RESULT_reg][1] : ~TYPO ~IF ~ISINITDEFINED[0] ~THEN := ~CONST[5] ~ELSE ~FI;
begin
  ~RESULT <= ~SYM[1]; ~IF ~ISSYNC[0] ~THEN
  ~GENSYM[~RESULT_r][2] : process(~ARG[2])
  begin
    if rising_edge(~ARG[2]) then
      if ~ARG[3] = ~IF ~ISACTIVEHIGH[0] ~THEN '1' ~ELSE '0' ~FI then
        ~SYM[1] <= ~CONST[6]
        -- pragma translate_off
        after 1 ps
        -- pragma translate_on
        ;
      elsif ~ARG[4] then
        ~SYM[1] <= ~ARG[7]
        -- pragma translate_off
        after 1 ps
        -- pragma translate_on
        ;
      end if;
    end if;
  end process;~ELSE
  ~SYM[2] : process(~ARG[2],~ARG[3])
  begin
    if ~ARG[3] = ~IF ~ISACTIVEHIGH[0] ~THEN '1' ~ELSE '0' ~FI then
      ~SYM[1] <= ~CONST[6];
    elsif rising_edge(~ARG[2]) then
      if ~ARG[4] then
        ~SYM[1] <= ~ARG[7]
        -- pragma translate_off
        after 1 ps
        -- pragma translate_on
        ;
      end if;
    end if;
  end process;~FI
end block;~ELSE
~SYM[0] : block
  signal ~SYM[1] : ~TYPO := ~CONST[5];
begin
  ~RESULT <= ~SYM[1]; ~IF ~ISSYNC[0] ~THEN
  ~SYM[2] : process(~ARG[2])
  begin
    if rising_edge(~ARG[2]) then
      if ~ARG[3] = ~IF ~ISACTIVEHIGH[0] ~THEN '1' ~ELSE '0' ~FI then
        ~SYM[1] <= ~CONST[6]
        -- pragma translate_off
        after 1 ps
        -- pragma translate_on
        ;
      else
        ~SYM[1] <= ~ARG[7]
        -- pragma translate_off
        after 1 ps
        -- pragma translate_on
        ;
      end if;
    end if;
  end process;~ELSE
  ~SYM[2] : process(~ARG[2],~ARG[3])
  begin
    if ~ARG[3] = ~IF ~ISACTIVEHIGH[0] ~THEN '1' ~ELSE '0' ~FI then
      ~SYM[1] <= ~CONST[6]
      -- pragma translate_off
      after 1 ps
      -- pragma translate_on
      ;
    elsif rising_edge(~ARG[2]) then
      ~SYM[1] <= ~ARG[7]
      -- pragma translate_off
      after 1 ps
      -- pragma translate_on
      ;
    end if;
  end process;~FI
end block;~FI
-- register end

BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.clockGen
BlackBox.type:
clockGen
  :: KnownDomain dom conf-- ARG[0]
  => Clock dom
BlackBox.comment:
ModelSim and Vivado seem to round time values to an integer number of picoseconds.
        Use two half periods to prevent rounding errors from affecting the full period.

BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.tbClockGen
BlackBox.type:
tbClockGen
  :: KnownDomain dom conf-- ARG[0]
  => Signal dom Bool     -- ARG[1]
  -> Clock dom

BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.resetGen
BlackBox.type: resetGen :: KnownDomain dom conf => Reset dom
BlackBox.template:
-- resetGen begin
-- pragma translate_off
~RESULT <= ~IF ~ISACTIVEHIGH[0] ~THEN '1' ~ELSE '0' ~FI,
           ~IF ~ISACTIVEHIGH[0] ~THEN '0' ~ELSE '1' ~FI after ~IF~ISSYNC[0]~THEN(2999 ps + ~PERIOD[0] ps)~ELSE3001 ps~FI;
-- pragma translate_on
-- resetGen end

BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.unsafeFromReset
BlackBox.type: unsafeFromReset :: Reset dom -> Signal dom Bool

BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.unsafeToReset
BlackBox.type: unsafeToReset :: KnownDomain dom conf => Signal dom Bool -> Reset dom
